pages.title: Strange Mushrooms
pages.text: $(l)Research Report #2$()$(br2)Found only in the $(l:1928/host_biome)Host Biome$(), these mushrooms are very... exquisite. Not only do they have this unusual long cap and dark color, they also are one of the few things that are able to grow here. Many consider them dangerous,
but my research has reached a dead end... I think, no, I'm positive some good can be done with them. In honor of my family, I'm naming them the $(l)Morbus Mushrooms$().
